channel.title: Mapconfig.txt Error (fixed) (helping anyone who has this problem)
channel.description:
[code=text]java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\PKXILECACHE2\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:1169) at client.startUp(client.java:9729) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:78) at client.run(client.java:6389) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) PKXILECACHE2 -1 : 0[/code]
if you have this problem message me and ill get it fixed.
